dict.acceptation: 隧道；地道；烟道；（动物栖息的）穴；
在…挖掘隧道；在…打开通道；

sent.orig: Control blasting technique fits to soft rock tunnel, especially to coal tunnel and half-coal tunnel.
sent.trans: 控制爆破适合在软岩巷道，尤其是在煤巷、半煤巷掘进中应用，可以使劳动组织不断优化。

sent.orig: The WenFu railroad Guantouling tunnel DK280 +950 ~281 +100 is one under crossing the highway tunnel.
sent.trans: 温福铁路管头岭隧道在DK280+950~281+100段下穿同三高速公路管头岭隧道。

sent.orig: After mining to the stopping line, the top tunnel synchronizes with the bottom tunnel.
sent.trans: 采煤回采至停采线之前，上下巷经常不同步。

sent.orig: The first use of urban tunnel with upper vents is HongXing road tunnel in ChengDu.
sent.trans: 成都市红星路下穿市政隧道首次采用了顶部开孔的自然通风方式。

sent.orig: Nanling tunnel is a shallow-hurried tunnel where karst develops and geological condition is very complicated.
sent.trans: 南岭隧道是地质条件极为复杂、岩溶发育的浅埋隧道。
